Title: Safe as Houses
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Adam Stein, David Grimm (story editor), Alyssa Clark (story editor), Yasmin Yilmaz (staff writer)
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Kurt Egyiawan, Li Jun Li
Plot: Tomas and Marcus attempt to finish Cindy's exorcism and escape the wrath of her family.
